#include <iostream>
#include <cstdlib>
bool isPalin(int c){
	int temp=0;
	int test=c;
	while(test>0){
		int dig=test%10;
		temp=temp*10+dig;
		test/=10;}
	if(temp==c) return true;
	else return false;
}

int nextPalin(int palin){
	int next=palin;
	while(true){
		if(isPalin(next)) break;
		else next++;
	}
	return next;
}
int main(){
	int t,n;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--){
	scanf("%d",&n);
	std::cout<<nextPalin(n)<<std::endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
